#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
using namespace std ;

int main() {
//    freopen("array.in","r",stdin);
    int c,c2;
    int tests;
    scanf("%d",&tests);
    while (tests--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d",&n);
        vector<int> arr(n);
        for (c=0;c<n;c++)
            scanf("%d",&arr[c]);
        sort(arr.rbegin(),arr.rend());
        printf("%d\n",arr[0]);
    }
    return 0;
}
